translation.en: ♪ I can feel it ♪ ♪ Coming in the air tonight ♪
[man] Just when you think it's all over,
translation.it: Proprio quando pensi che sia tutto finito,

translation.en: something unspeakable comes after you and your family,
translation.it: qualcosa di inimmaginabile scova te e la tua famiglia,

translation.en: murders your sister Jenny in cold blood,
translation.it: uccide tua sorella Jenny a sangue freddo

translation.en: and disappears into thin air.
But a clue left behind leads us here, to this club in Bangkok.
translation.it: Ma ci lascia un indizio che ci porta qui, in questo locale di Bangkok.

translation.en: And that's why we still need the Wu Assassin.
translation.it: Ed ecco perché abbiamo ancora bisogno dell'Assassino del Wu.

translation.en: [woman] What's a Wu Assassin?
[man] All right. So about a year ago,
my friends and I were living it up in San Francisco.
translation.it: io e i miei amici facevamo la bella vita a San Francisco.

translation.en: Uh, my sister, Jenny, and I, we ran this restaurant,
translation.it: Mia sorella Jenny e io avevamo un ristorante

translation.en: and, um, my boy Lu Xin, he ran cars,
translation.it: e il mio amico Lu Xin rubava macchine.

translation.en: until she showed up.
A 10,000-year-old warrior spirit brought back to Earth.
translation.it: uno spirito guerriero vecchio diecimila anni riportato sulla Terra.

translation.en: And then she gave her powers to Kai, my best friend.
translation.it: E ha dato i suoi poteri a Kai, il mio migliore amico,

translation.en: And then he became the last Wu Assassin. Whatever.
translation.it: che è diventato l'ultimo Assassino del Wu. Niente di che.

translation.en: What, like The Avengers?
-Yeah. -Hmm. -But Asian. -Hmm.
Actually, no. More like that show from the '70s.
translation.it: Anzi, no. Siamo più quella serie degli anni 70.

translation.en: Kai and Lu Xin are the Angels. I'm like Charlie.
translation.it: Kai e Lu Xin sono gli angeli, e io Charlie.

translation.en: So what kind of mission?
translation.it: E qual è la vostra missione?

translation.en: Um, it's a supernatural one.
Sounds dangerous. [man] It's what we do.
translation.it: - Sembra pericoloso. - È il nostro mestiere.

translation.en: -[man 2] You seeing this? -[man 3] You know why we're here.
translation.it: Li vedi? Sanno perché siamo qui.

translation.en: So your friend Kai…
-What about him? -This Wu Assassin.
He's got to have some kind of powers, right?
[man] He's empowered by this thing called the Dao.
translation.it: I suoi poteri derivano da una cosa chiamata "il Dao".

translation.en: He's faster and stronger than any man. He calls himself Death's Instrument.
translation.it: Nessuno è più forte o più veloce. Si autodefinisce uno "strumento di morte".

translation.en: And your other friend?
Oh no, he's just really good at kicking ass.
translation.it: Oh no, lui picchia duro e basta.

translation.en: So why aren't you with them?
This seems more dangerous.
Do you want to continue your story somewhere else?
translation.it: Vuoi continuare la tua storia altrove?

translation.en: Hell, yeah. What about your friends?
translation.it: - Ci puoi scommettere. - E i tuoi amici?

translation.en: They'll be fine.
I think.
I fucking love Thailand.
Why Bangkok? I mean, what's here?
Answers.
I, uh, traced this material back to Thailand.
translation.it: Sono risalito all'origine di questo materiale, in Thailandia.

translation.en: It's from an ancient, old piece of stone.
translation.it: Viene da un antico pezzo di pietra.

translation.en: Kai! Up there! He's turning them.
Jiangshi. Chi vampire.
-What's so special about this? -[scoffs]
[man] I found it in my dead sister's hand.
translation.it: L'ho trovato in mano a mia sorella.

translation.en: Kai, Lu Xin, and I came back to my family restaurant,
translation.it: Kai, Lu Xin e io siamo tornati al mio ristorante

translation.en: and she was just there, dead on the ground.
translation.it: e lei era lì, sul pavimento, morta.

translation.en: Well, here's to your sister.
You want to know a secret? Sure.
[whispering] Come here.
I don't drink anymore.
This will turn you into a Jiangshi, won't it?
translation.it: Ti trasforma in un Jiangshi, no?

translation.en: [breathing heavily] I just want to talk.
Your powers don't work on me.
translation.it: I tuoi poteri non funzionano con me.

translation.en: Who killed Jenny? [grunting]
Who killed my sister?
-Kai! -[grunting]
-He's not talking! -Ah! [grunts]
Assassin's strike.
That's not what I was thinking at all.
translation.it: Questo non era nei miei piani.

translation.en: Yo. Hey, hey! What is this? Yo! Press the start button, man.
translation.it: Yo, ehi, che succede? Falli ripartire!

translation.en: This isn't me.
It's me. I need your help.
translation.it: Sono io. Mi serve il vostro aiuto.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] You? Who are you? [man's voice] No, I'm speaking through them.
translation.it: - Tu? Chi sei? - No, parlo attraverso di loro.

translation.en: I can't hold it for long.
It's not safe to put myself out here like this.
translation.it: Non è sicuro per me rimanere così allo scoperto.

translation.en: What do you want?
[man's voice] Not here.
8:00 a.m. Silom Temple archaeological dig site.
translation.it: Alle otto, agli scavi archeologici del tempio Silom.

translation.en: We have much to discuss, Wu Assassin.
translation.it: Abbiamo molto di cui parlare, Assassino del Wu.

translation.en: I am never coming to a club with you ever again.
translation.it: È l'ultima volta che vengo in un locale con te.

translation.en: -Who was that? -We should call Tommy.
[Tommy] Stop the van!
Yeah. She didn't know anything.
What about your Jiangshi?
I guess we finally have a lead.
The archaeological site is owned by this biotech billionaire.
translation.it: Il sito archeologico appartiene a un miliardario delle biotecnologie.

translation.en: Not much else on him, but he owns that building.
translation.it: Non si sa molto altro su di lui, tranne che possiede quell'edificio.

translation.en: So, uh, we're just going to roll onto his turf?
translation.it: Quindi ci presentiamo a casa sua?

translation.en: If it gets us closer to Jenny's killer, that's all that matters.
translation.it: Ci avvicinerà all'assassino di Jenny, è quello che conta.

translation.en: Looks shady as fuck.
[Tommy] It should be up on the right.
Guessing he's not the valet.
[narrator] Since founding his firm in 1999,
translation.it: Dalla fondazione della sua impresa nel 1999,

translation.en: William Pan has formed collaboration agreements with the world's largest companies.
translation.it: William Pan collabora con le più grandi compagnie al mondo,

translation.en: Providing scientists the opportunity and resources
translation.it: fornendo agli scienziati l'opportunità e le risorse

translation.en: to tackle humankind's most perplexing problems.
translation.it: per risolvere i problemi più misteriosi dell'umanità,

translation.en: All in service of William's unique vision.
translation.it: al servizio della visione, unica nel suo genere, di William.

translation.en: One people,
one world,
one planet.
We're not just looking to the future…
translation.it: Non ci limitiamo a guardare il futuro.

translation.en: we're looking to shape it.
Thank you for coming.
I know my message was unorthodox.
translation.it: So che il mio messaggio è stato poco ortodosso.

translation.en: I apologize for not meeting you in person. Communicating like that was difficult.
translation.it: Scusate se non vi ho incontrati di persona. Comunicare in quel modo è difficile.

translation.en: Dr. William Pan.
Do you know the story of Pan Gu?
translation.it: Conoscete la storia di Pan Gu?

translation.en: [Tommy] Yeah, we do.
The first man to shape the universe from the great nothingness
translation.it: Il primo uomo a modellare l'universo dal grande nulla,

translation.en: and made the heavens, the Earth, and the seas.
translation.it: creatore dei cieli, la terra e il mare.

translation.en: We all went to Chinese school.
translation.it: Siamo andati tutti alla scuola cinese.

translation.en: Chinese school didn't teach you what happened to Pan Gu
translation.it: Ma non vi hanno detto cosa accadde a Pan Gu

translation.en: after he became a god.
He went mad with power.
Threatened to remake the world in his own image.
translation.it: Minacciò di ricreare il mondo a propria immagine.

translation.en: But the Dao, in its infinite celestial wisdom,
translation.it: Ma il Dao, nella sua infinita saggezza celestiale,

translation.en: called upon the first Wu Assassin to strike down that first man.
translation.it: assegnò al primo Assassino del Wu il compito di uccidere il primo uomo.

translation.en: Yin and yang. Chaos and order.
translation.it: Yin e yang. Caos e ordine.

translation.en: These spirits have clashed for millennia.
translation.it: Sono millenni che i due spiriti si scontrano.

translation.en: I'm not the first vessel. But thanks to you, I am the last.
translation.it: Non sono la prima incarnazione. Ma grazie a te, sarò l'ultima.

translation.en: And with the world left unbalanced,
translation.it: E se il mondo è sbilanciato,

translation.en: chaos and I can finally complete our unending war.
translation.it: io e il caos possiamo finalmente porre fine alla nostra guerra infinita.

translation.en: I was attacked. Barely made it out alive.
translation.it: Sono stato attaccato. Ne sono uscito vivo per miracolo.

translation.en: And that's why I've retreated here for safety,
translation.it: Perciò mi sono ritirato qui al sicuro,

translation.en: while my twin continues to spread chaos.
translation.it: mentre la mia metà gemella continua a diffondere il caos.

translation.en: Who is he?
Yin and yang.
You might have heard of her. Ku An Qi. Queen of the Bangkok underworld.
translation.it: - Ne avrete sentito parlare. Ku An Qi. - La regina della criminalità di Bangkok.

translation.en: She's going global. Taking out any threats to her.
translation.it: La Thailandia non le basta più. Sta eliminando ogni minaccia.

translation.en: Consuming Chi to build her power.
translation.it: Consuma Chi per accrescere il proprio potere.

translation.en: The Shaolin in China. The Druids in Ireland.
translation.it: Gli Shaolin in Cina. I druidi in Irlanda.

translation.en: And last month, she went to San Francisco.
translation.it: E il mese scorso, è andata a San Francisco.

translation.en: Ku An Qi was looking for you, but your friend intervened.
translation.it: Ku An Qi cercava te, ma la tua amica è intervenuta.

translation.en: She fought valiantly.
But Ku cannot be stopped.
translation.it: Ma Ku non può essere fermata.

translation.en: She will continue her rampage if left unchecked.
translation.it: Devasterà ogni cosa se non verrà fermata.

translation.en: How do you know all this? [William] Because Ku and I are connected.
translation.it: - Come sai tutto questo? - Perché io e Ku siamo connessi.

translation.en: That is why I must be careful.
If I open myself up to her, she will come.
translation.it: Se mi apro a lei, verrà qui.

translation.en: Follow me.
This whole thing could be bullshit.
[William] In the fight, your sister took something of Ku's, a talisman.
translation.it: Durante lo scontro, tua sorella ha preso qualcosa da Ku, un talismano.

translation.en: I have the other half.
I assume you have hers.
What's it matter to you?
It's a piece of our Essence.
translation.it: È un pezzo della nostra Essenza.

translation.en: -She'll try to get it back. -Good. Send her my way.
translation.it: - Cercherà di riprenderselo. - Bene. La aspetto.

translation.en: In two days' time, my worse half
translation.it: Tra due giorni, la mia metà peggiore incontrerà i capi delle Cinque Triadi

translation.en: is meeting the heads of the Five Triads at the Vie Hotel,
translation.it: Tra due giorni, la mia metà peggiore incontrerà i capi delle Cinque Triadi all'hotel Vie, per consolidare il proprio potere.

translation.en: solidifying her power base.
translation.it: all'hotel Vie, per consolidare il proprio potere.

translation.en: Cameras everywhere, no weapons allowed.
-There's no honor in guns. -And won't she know what you're up to?
translation.it: - Non c'è onore nelle pistole. - E non sa cosa progetti?

translation.en: I'm doing my best to shield my thoughts from her.
translation.it: Faccio del mio meglio per celare i miei pensieri.

translation.en: My powers extend to the mind,
translation.it: I miei poteri si estendono alla mente,

translation.en: while hers are focused on the body.
translation.it: i suoi si concentrano sul corpo.

translation.en: A kidnapping mission in broad daylight.
Hotel security,
the five bosses of the Triads, their whole crews.
translation.it: i cinque boss delle Triadi e tutti i loro scagnozzi.

translation.en: You know what?
I got a better idea.
translation.it: Ho un'idea migliore. Perché non usi il tuo controllo mentale

translation.en: Why don't you do the mind control thing and send an army after them?
translation.it: Ho un'idea migliore. Perché non usi il tuo controllo mentale - e le mandi contro un esercito? - Non posso controllare un esercito.

translation.en: [William] I can't control an army.
translation.it: - e le mandi contro un esercito? - Non posso controllare un esercito.

translation.en: I can reach out, communicate, hold a thought for a minute.
translation.it: Posso comunicare, mantenere un pensiero per un minuto.

translation.en: -[Lu Xin sighs] -But that is the extent of my powers now.
translation.it: Ma ora i miei poteri si fermano qui.

translation.en: Well, it seems like you got all the answers, but the answers.
translation.it: Beh, sembra che tu abbia tutte le risposte tranne quelle che ci servono.

translation.en: We're in.
When you subdue Ku, you bring her to me with the talisman,
translation.it: Quando avrete sconfitto Ku, portatemela col talismano,

translation.en: and I'll take care of the rest. No.
translation.it: - e io penserò al resto. - No.

translation.en: You said the Dao is broken. [William] Yes.
translation.it: - Hai detto che il Dao è rotto. - Sì.

translation.en: But you and I together, maybe we can restore it.
translation.it: Ma forse io e te insieme possiamo risanarlo.

translation.en: Or we let it be broken.
And I kill her.
[Lu Xin] The hotel, it's a death trap.
Yeah, but it's the person, demigod, whatever, who murdered Jenny.
translation.it: Sì, ma questa persona, semidea, quello che è, ha ucciso Jenny.

translation.en: Yes, I understand that, which is why we need to be smart about it.
translation.it: Sì, lo capisco, perciò dobbiamo giocare d'astuzia.

translation.en: -Look at the pieces in front of us. -This isn't a game.
translation.it: - Considerare tutti i pezzi. - Non è un gioco.

translation.en: Actually, it is a game. Everything is a game, Tommy.
translation.it: Sì, invece. Tutto è un gioco, Tommy.

translation.en: We have the perfect opportunity right now. We should take advantage of it.
translation.it: Questa è l'opportunità perfetta, dobbiamo sfruttarla.

translation.en: If you have a death wish because of your sister, don't drag me--
translation.it: Se vuoi morire per tua sorella, non trascinarci…

translation.en: You act like you don't care about Jenny at all!
translation.it: Sembra che a te di Jenny non freghi niente!

translation.en: -[Lu Xin] That's the game. No one's safe. -[Tommy] Ah, fuck you, man.
translation.it: - Nessuno è al sicuro qui, Tommy. - Fottiti.

translation.en: -Yeah, fuck you too. -[Kai] Guys! Calm down.
I'm calm!
Ku An Qi wants the Wu Assassin. I'll give her the Wu Assassin. Myself.
translation.it: Ku An Qi vuole l'Assassino del Wu, e io glielo darò. Sono io.

translation.en: We're going together.
-No. -It might not be the smartest choice,
translation.it: - No. - Potrebbe non essere l'idea migliore,

translation.en: but, look, this is the only opportunity we have.
translation.it: ma è l'unica opportunità che abbiamo.

translation.en: Fuck that. No way. I'll do this one alone.
translation.it: Fanculo, neanche per sogno. Ci vado da solo.

translation.en: You know what your problem is, Kai?
translation.it: Sai qual è il tuo problema?

translation.en: You think because you have powers, you're better than us.
translation.it: Pensi che i tuoi poteri ti rendano migliore di noi.

translation.en: Like we're just some kind of fucking burden.
translation.it: Per te siamo solo un cazzo di peso.

translation.en: Lu Xin is calling his contact.
translation.it: Lu Xin sta chiamando il suo contatto.

translation.en: Can he get a rocket launcher to take Ku down?
You never know, with magic.
translation.it: Con la magia, non si sa mai.

translation.en: But I guess this worked.
Let me show you something.
Keep this finger loose. It'll make it easier.
translation.it: Rilassa questo dito. Sarà più facile.

translation.en: Try that.
I'm coming. I don't care what you say.
I have to go. Okay?
[Kai] Look, Tommy.
You go angry, you get yourself killed.
translation.it: Se cedi alla rabbia, ti farai ammazzare.

translation.en: That's… that's not how you fight.
You got to understand, though, man.
It's the only thing I have.
Anger.
Sorry to break up the tanning session, boys.
translation.it: Scusate se interrompo la tintarella, ragazzi.

translation.en: Bad news. [sighs] The dude who outfitted us for the Jiangshi mission blocked me.
translation.it: Brutte notizie. Il tizio che ci ha armati contro il Jiangshi mi ha bloccato.

translation.en: Too much heat at the club.
Anyone else?
I mean, as soon as they hear we're going after Ku An Qi, they lose my number fast.
translation.it: Appena sentono che l'obiettivo è Ku An Qi, scordano il mio numero.

translation.en: I might know someone crazy enough to help.
translation.it: Forse conosco una persona abbastanza pazza da aiutarci.

translation.en: What? Since when did you get a Bangkok hookup?
translation.it: Cosa? E da quando hai un contatto a Bangkok?

translation.en: I said "might." I'll hit her up.
translation.it: Ho detto forse. Provo a contattarla.

translation.en: Something just doesn't feel right about this.
[Lu Xin] Something smells good.
-Whoa,. -[Tommy] Thank you so much.
What's Preeya look like anyway?
Like that.
Hey! How are you?
-Hey! -It's been a long time. What's happen--
translation.it: - Ciao! Come stai? - Ciao! Quanto tempo. Come va…

translation.en: Now we've got that over with. What's up, Thomas?
translation.it: Così ci siamo tolti il pensiero. Che succede, Thomas?

translation.en: Uh, first, why are we meeting here?
translation.it: - Thomas? - Innanzitutto, perché ci incontriamo qui?

translation.en: Oh, you know, support the local economy.
Plus, it's out in the open. Can't be
translation.it: E poi è all'aperto. Non si è mai

translation.en: too careful these days.
You, I know.
[inhales] Them…
-[grunts] -…don't know.
Oh shit. [Tommy] Where are we going?
[Preeya] Ah, too many questions.
[man] You know who I work for?
Interpol, police of the world.
We know your Triad is meeting with Ku An Qi, a known terrorist.
translation.it: Sappiamo che la tua Triade incontrerà Ku An Qi, una nota terrorista.

translation.en: When?
And where?
[whispers] Good luck.
That means, fuck off. Both of you.
translation.it: Significa fuori dai coglioni. Tutti e due.

translation.en: You wanna have fun?
The Vie Hotel, tomorrow.
You might wanna call in the cleaners.
translation.it: Meglio che venga qualcuno a pulire.

translation.en: I thought he gave you the information.
The actual cleaners. He soiled himself.
translation.it: Sì, ma se l'è fatta addosso.

translation.en: [Tommy] Uh, Preeya, meet the boys.
Boys, this is, uh, Preeya.
'Sup. Lu Xin.
-Lu, is that a "Sin" or a "Xin"? -Is that supposed to be a funny joke?
translation.it: - "Sin" come peccato, o Xin? - Dovrebbe far ridere?

translation.en: -What's his problem? -Don't worry. He's cool.
translation.it: - Che problemi ha? - Non farci caso.

translation.en: Uh, this is my man, Kai.
translation.it: Lui è il mio amico Kai.

translation.en: -[Kai, in Thai] Hello. -[in Thai] Hello.
[in English] See? Someone's got manners.
translation.it: Visto? Lui conosce le buone maniere.

translation.en: -Where's your sister? -Oh, she's not here.
translation.it: - Tua sorella dov'è? - Non è qui.

translation.en: That's too bad. I love Jen.
Anywho. Hear you boys are on a suicide mission.
translation.it: Comunque, ho saputo che vi preparate per una missione suicida.

translation.en: What the fuck, Thomas. You told her?
translation.it: Ma che cazzo, Thomas, gliel'hai detto?

translation.en: It's the only way she'd help. I have to tell her everything.
translation.it: Altrimenti non ci avrebbe aiutati. Sì, mi piace sapere in cosa mi sto cacciando.

translation.en: Yeah, I like to know what I'm getting into.
translation.it: Sì, mi piace sapere in cosa mi sto cacciando.

translation.en: Due diligence.
If you know, then why are you helping?
translation.it: Se lo sai, perché ci aiuti?

translation.en: I don't mind a little action. It's part of the territory.
translation.it: L'azione non mi dispiace, è il mio mestiere.

translation.en: This woman you're dealing with, serious shit. Lots of people dying.
translation.it: La donna che cercate non scherza. È morta parecchia gente.

translation.en: She needs to be stopped.
Can you get this?
Let me make some calls. Enjoy your shopping, boys.
translation.it: Fammi fare qualche telefonata. Buone compere, ragazzi.

translation.en: Keep your mouth shut.
Shopping?
The fuck?
-[Tommy] Thank you. -[Lu Xin speaking Thai]
-[Kai] Tommy? -Yeah.
translation.it: Tommy? - Sì? - Ripetimi come la conosci?

translation.en: How do you know her again?
So I was actually here five years ago, and someone stole my Louis V backpack.
translation.it: Cinque anni fa, ero qui e mi hanno rubato lo zaino di LV.

translation.en: They took my wallet, passport, phone, everything.
So I went to the cops to report it, and, uh, the cops didn't do anything.
translation.it: Sono andato alla polizia e non hanno fatto niente.

translation.en: -So, someone told me to go talk to-- -Uh.
translation.it: Poi qualcuno mi ha detto di parlare con Pree…

translation.en: I'm just gonna make this story short and sweet, in case we ever have to hear it again, okay?
translation.it: Faccio un riassunto in caso dovessimo sentirla di nuovo.

translation.en: He got his shit jacked, and he doesn't know anything about her.
translation.it: Si è fatto scippare e non sa niente di lei.

translation.en: Okay, guys. Look, she's our only hookup.
translation.it: Sentite, è il nostro unico contatto. Ci serve.

translation.en: -We need this. -[Preeya] And beggars can't be choosers.
translation.it: E non siete nelle condizioni di fare gli schizzinosi.

translation.en: -[Tommy] Did you get it? -[Preeya] Yes, every goddamn thing.
translation.it: - Ce le hai? - Sì, ho tutto.

translation.en: -[Tommy] See? -[sniffs]
Thank you!
Listen. I know it's none of my business.
translation.it: Sentite, so che non mi riguarda,

translation.en: But, you know, I'm fond of this one. So I got to tell you guys that your plan--
translation.it: ma ci tengo a lui. Perciò devi dirvi che il vostro piano…

translation.en: Is none of your business.
Relax, big guy.
-[chuckles] -[Preeya] We're on the same team.
There is no way you're getting that hardware into the Vie Hotel.
translation.it: Non riuscirete mai a portare quella roba dentro l'hotel Vie.

translation.en: It's locked down tight, and the only way in is through the front.
translation.it: È ben sorvegliato, e si entra solo dall'ingresso principale.

translation.en: I don't like this. We need to rethink it.
translation.it: Non mi piace. Serve un altro piano.

translation.en: All right. I'll take care of it.
No. Tomorrow, we're all going. We're gonna get Jenny's killer together.
translation.it: No, affronteremo l'assassina di Jenny tutti insieme.

translation.en: Hey! Yo!
Jen's dead?
Uh, yeah. Our target took her out.
translation.it: Sì. Il nostro obiettivo l'ha uccisa.

translation.en: Now it's our turn. Shit.
translation.it: - Ora è il nostro turno. - Merda.

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
I can help you get in. It's dangerous.
translation.it: - Posso aiutarvi a entrare. - È pericoloso.

translation.en: I know.
Security there is tight. We can use that to our advantage.
translation.it: La sicurezza è tosta. Possiamo usarla a nostro vantaggio.

translation.en: We?
[Preeya] Morning, boys. Hey. Thanks.
Is this your idea of a joke?
Trust me.
This is 007 shit.
We're good.
Okay. Be careful with these. [Preeya] Wow. What's so special about them?
translation.it: - Ok. Fa' attenzione con questi. - Perché? Cos'hanno di speciale?

translation.en: -Magic. -Come on. Let's go.
We're gonna get justice for her.
[Lu Xin] What do you think?
You don't want to know, Lu.
Then we're thinking the same thing. Come on.
translation.it: Allora pensiamo la stessa cosa. Andiamo.

translation.en: [Tommy] Okay. Whoa, whoa! What did we do? We didn't do anything! Goddamn!
translation.it: Che succede? Non abbiamo fatto niente! Maledizione!

translation.en: [Preeya] A bit much, isn't it? Are you guys seeing this?
translation.it: - Non vi sembra di esagerare? - Li vedete?

translation.en: [scoffs] Looks like a dipshit nobody.
[guard 2] Get up.
-All right. Easy. Easy. -[Tommy] Can I talk to your manager?
translation.it: - Vacci piano! - Lei è il direttore? - Sì. - Piano!

translation.en: Hey, we're just on holiday.
-[Preeya grunts] -[Tommy] We're valued customers.
One-star Yelp review on the way!
translation.it: Vi aspetta una recensione da una stella su Yelp!

translation.en: Agent Zulu.
Let the hotel security handle that. You just focus on…
translation.it: Lascia che ci pensi la sicurezza dell'hotel. Concentrati su…

translation.en: [in Thai] Why are you here?
You're wasting your time.
It's for Songkran, the Thai water festival.
translation.it: Sono per il Songkran, la festa in cui si gioca con l'acqua.

translation.en: That's not until April.
Yeah. Well, we like to be prepared.
translation.it: Sì, beh, ci piace essere preparati.

translation.en: Now you're gonna have to reorganize her bag.
translation.it: Ora le rimetti a posto la borsa.

translation.en: You for real? [Tommy] Yes, I'm for real.
-[guard] Bullshit! -[Tommy] Look at all this mess.
Stay here.
[man, in French] What's going on?
[in English] Where is our fucking visual?
translation.it: Perché non vediamo più un cazzo?

translation.en: -I'm working on it. -[Zulu] Our gear is still working.
translation.it: - Ci sto lavorando. - Gli strumenti funzionano.

translation.en: Whatever is happening is only affecting the hotel.
translation.it: Qualunque cosa sia, riguarda solo l'hotel.

translation.en: Something is going down.
This is not good.
-[sighs] -[man] Zulu! Zulu!
[Ku An Qi, in Thai] You are my men now.
-Close your eyes. -What?
Just close your eyes.
-Trust me. -[guard] Come on!
Come on. Let's get out of here.
-[elevator dings] -See you in a second.
[guard] Stop!
-Good timing. -Yeah. Of course it is.
Ah, fuck. Who the fuck did this?
translation.it: Oh, cazzo. Chi cazzo è stato?

translation.en: -[Zulu] Hands where I can see 'em. -[gun cocks]
What are you doing here?
-[Kai] You know her? -Yeah, we met in London.
translation.it: - La conosci? - Sì, l'ho conosciuta Londra.

translation.en: I was pushing some Aston Martins,
and my broker turned out to be Interpol's finest.
-Look, hey, these bodies-- -Get down on your knees!
This wasn't us. So you just tripped and fell into a massacre?
translation.it: - Non siamo stati noi. - Siete inciampati in questo massacro?

translation.en: Zama, you know me. You think I would do this?
translation.it: Zama, mi conosci. Pensi che farei una cosa simile?

translation.en: There's a lot I don't know about you, Lu.
translation.it: Ci sono tante cose di te che non so.

translation.en: This is bigger and more complicated than you can imagine.
translation.it: È una faccenda più complicata di quanto immagini.

translation.en: Try me. The fate of the world.
-I didn't come to fuck around. -Don't!
translation.it: - Non sono qui per giocare. - No!

translation.en: Agent Boucher. I have two suspects. I need backup.
translation.it: Agente Boucher, ho due sospetti. Mi servono rinforzi.

translation.en: Whoever got them probably got your team.
translation.it: Il responsabile avrà fatto fuori anche la tua squadra.

translation.en: Interlace your fingers behind your head, -and get down on the floor. -[chuckling]
translation.it: Mani dietro la testa e in ginocchio.

translation.en: -I don't want to hurt you. -Kai. Don't.
translation.it: - Non voglio farti del male. - Kai, no.

translation.en: Listen to your friend. He seems to be the reasonable one.
translation.it: Ascolta il tuo amico. È quello più ragionevole.

translation.en: First time I've heard that. Lower your gun.
translation.it: Questa è nuova. Abbassa la pistola.

translation.en: -What the fuck happened here? -We're working on it.
translation.it: - Che cazzo è successo? - Ci stiamo lavorando.

translation.en: Let her go. She's not the threat. Please.
translation.it: Lasciala andare, non è una minaccia. Per favore.

translation.en: Look, it's clear that none of us are the bad guys.
translation.it: Sentite, è chiaro che nessuno di noi è il cattivo.

translation.en: But they are coming.
[exhales] Who's coming? The entire hotel.
[Lu Xin] On your six!
-I got it. -I'm just looking out for you.
translation.it: - Ce la faccio. - Volevo solo aiutarti.

translation.en: -Because that's always been your MO. -Here we go again.
You could just say sorry. -[Zulu] What? [laughing] -Sorry works just fine.
[Preeya] Did you guys, like, used to date or--
-No! -No!
Assassin.
Why are you here? [Zan] They offered me a deal.
translation.it: - Che ci fai qui? - Mi hanno offerto uno scambio.

translation.en: The Wu Assassin in exchange for power.
translation.it: L'Assassino del Wu per il potere.

translation.en: [Tommy] Where we going?
-Fuck. Come with me -Go!
[Lu Xin] Shit!
Fuck! Get in the car!
Looks like you're not the only special one.
[Lu Xin] Look out!
[Tommy] Hey. Hey, hey, take it easy.
[grunts] Fuck.
[Tommy] It's locked!
Go!
Door says push, not pull.
What?
Hold up. Where's Kai? Don't worry about Kai, all right?
translation.it: - Aspettate. Dov'è Kai? - Non preoccuparti per Kai, ok?

translation.en: Oh shit. You okay?
Yo, you good?
-[Lu Xin] Yo, we gotta go. Come on. -My van's still here. Come on!
translation.it: - Dobbiamo andarcene. - Il mio furgone è ancora qui. Venite!

translation.en: Get in.
-[Lu Xin] What happened back there? -What happened in here?
translation.it: - Cos'è successo là fuori? - Cos'è successo qui dentro?

translation.en: This is chaotic.
You know what to do.
If only you would've listened to me when I told you something's sketchy.
translation.it: Avreste dovuto ascoltarmi quando ho detto che c'era sotto qualcosa.

translation.en: We didn't have another lead.
[in Thai] Take them down.
Get me out of here now.
-[in English] Shit. -What?
In case you thought we lost 'em, we didn't.
translation.it: Se pensavate che li avessimo seminati, non è così.

translation.en: -Hold tight. -[brakes screeching]
Can you get to Khaosan Road? -We have another safe house there. -Yeah.
translation.it: - C'è una casa sicura in Khaosan Road. - Sì.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Shit.
[Zulu] It's the end of the road.
translation.it: Merda, di qui non si passa.

translation.en: Shit.
[man] Get out of the car!
-She's locking down the city. -What are we gonna do?
translation.it: - Ci sta bloccando in città. - Che facciamo?

translation.en: Sail away.
I'm really starting to strongly dislike you.
translation.it: Tu non mi piaci per niente.

translation.en: We get to the canal. Take a boat up the Chao Phraya.
translation.it: Arriviamo al canale e risaliamo il Chao Phraya in barca.

translation.en: That plan is just--
[Ku An Qi, in Thai] Stop firing.
Get them out of the car. Bring them to me.
[in English] I changed my mind. I like the plan. [Tommy] Yeah. River, boat.
translation.it: - Ho cambiato idea. Il piano mi piace. - Sì. Fiume, barca.

translation.en: -If you wanna join me, guns are up top. -[Preeya] Come on.
translation.it: Se volete contribuire, le pistole sono qua sopra. Forza.

translation.en: Shoot it! Let's get these fuckers!
Ah, fuck. I'm all out.
[Lu Xin] They're trying to burn us alive. We gotta go!
[Zulu] Okay. Everybody, follow me.
♪ So I, I only spit fire and dope ♪ ♪ So later on you can go quote ♪
Yo, what's up?
-♪ Never lose sight, I'm true dude ♪ -Good timing.
Never seen that before.
I picked up a few things since you ghosted me.
translation.it: Ho imparato qualcosina da quando sei sparito.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, if I'd have stayed, it would've been behind bars, wouldn't it?
translation.it: Se fossi rimasto sarei finito dietro le sbarre, no?

translation.en: This way. The river.
[Lu Xin] Get out the way!
[Preeya] Get to the boat!
[Lu Xin] Get out the way!
[in Thai] Get off my boat!
[Lu Xin] Kai! Look out!
-[Lu Xin] Go, go! -[boat engine accelerating]
-[Kai] Get us out of here! -[Tommy] Come on!
Hurry, they're catching up!
[Lu Xin] Get out of the way! Get out of the way!
We're almost there. It's just up ahead.
[man] Ah, Preeya!
[in Thai] You are back.
I didn't know if we'd ever see you.
translation.it: Non sapevo se ti avremmo più rivista.

translation.en: [Tommy, in English] Everyone's excited to see you. So this is your home.
translation.it: - Sembrano tutti felici di vederti. - È casa tua?

translation.en: -It's been a while since I was last here. -[Tommy] What about your family?
translation.it: - Era tanto che non venivo. - E la tua famiglia?

translation.en: They were long gone before that.
What's this?
Magical protection.
If they don't want you, you can't pass.
translation.it: Se non ti vogliono, non puoi passare.

translation.en: I guess they want us in.
This is the home of a shaman.
translation.it: Questa è la casa di uno sciamano.

translation.en: He knows everything about the supernatural.
If anyone might know what's going on, it's Chatree.
translation.it: Se c'è qualcuno che sa cosa sta succedendo, è Chatree.

translation.en: [in Thai] You used to call me a charlatan, didn't you?
translation.it: Non dicevi che ero un ciarlatano?

translation.en: Uncle!
[in English] It's nice to meet everyone.
You all must be starving.
-[Zulu] 100% -[Lu Xin] How'd you know?
[Chatree] Usually, I am the one showing hospitality.
translation.it: Di solito sono io a offrire ospitalità.

translation.en: [Kai] You are.
It is my honor to have such an esteemed guest.
translation.it: È un onore per me avere qui un ospite così illustre.

translation.en: What do you know about Pan Gu?
In Thailand, we don't talk business on an empty stomach.
translation.it: In Thailandia, non parliamo di lavoro a stomaco vuoto.

translation.en: Is that a saying? One that I just made up.
translation.it: - È un modo di dire? - L'ho appena inventato.

translation.en: There are people after us.
There will always be people after you.
Here we are well-protected.
We have weapons.
[grunts] Is this a prank?
[Chatree] No.
But it is funny that this bracelet is yours.
translation.it: Ma è buffo, questo bracciale è tuo.

translation.en: But it is not for you.
You speak like Yoda, old man.
I am only 50. [chuckling]
Uncle.
William Pan, he wasn't, uh, completely honest with you.
translation.it: William Pan non è stato del tutto sincero con voi.

translation.en: Yeah? No shit.
Pan and Ku An Qi are opposite forces.
translation.it: Pan e Ku An Qi sono forze opposte.

translation.en: and yang.
But they are not in opposition to each other.
They are two halves of a whole.
translation.it: Sono due metà di un intero.

translation.en: They have been working in harmony
through all their births, lives, deaths, rebirths
translation.it: una nascita, vita, morte e resurrezione dopo l'altra,

translation.en: towards one goal, reforming back to Pan Gu,
translation.it: per raggiungere un obiettivo: ridiventare Pan Gu,

translation.en: the first man.
And using their power, they will remake the world in their image.
translation.it: E usando il loro potere, riplasmare il mondo a loro immagine.

translation.en: And now that the Dao is broken,
translation.it: E ora che il Dao è rotto,

translation.en: they have the opportunity.
How will they do that?
By harnessing the Chi of the one who split them.
translation.it: Impadronendosi del Chi di colui che li ha separati.

translation.en: The Wu Assassin.
The two of them each have a piece of their old Essence.
translation.it: Ciascuno di loro ha un pezzo della loro vecchia Essenza.

translation.en: The only constant they have,
forged from the stone of the temple where they were split.
translation.it: forgiata dalla pietra del tempio in cui furono separati.

translation.en: If they can infuse the pieces with Kai's Chi,
translation.it: Se riescono a infondere i pezzi del Chi di Kai,

translation.en: they will be able to connect the halves.
Does it look something like this?
Where did you get that from?
I mean, it doesn't matter. If it's part of Ku, we'll just destroy it--
translation.it: Non ha importanza. Se è parte di Ku, lo distruggiamo…

translation.en: -[all yelling] -[Chatree] It can't be destroyed!
I've had quite enough, thank you.
This… This whole thing is just crazy. [sighs]
-[sighs] -You okay?
I'm just trying to wrap my head around
translation.it: Sto cercando di venire a patti con questa roba soprannaturale

translation.en: this supernatural shit and the world ending.
translation.it: Sto cercando di venire a patti con questa roba soprannaturale e la fine del mondo.

translation.en: Yeah.
What did you do when you first found out?
translation.it: Tu cos'hai fatto quando l'hai scoperto?

translation.en: I had just shot a Russian gangster in the face.
translation.it: Avevo appena sparato in faccia a un gangster russo.

translation.en: So you could say it was a little bit weird.
translation.it: Perciò è stato strano, per così dire.

translation.en: Honestly?
I poured myself a big fucking drink.
translation.it: Mi sono fatto una cazzo di bevuta.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Ugh. This is terrible.
Can't be worse than that Chinese whiskey we had in Brick Lane.
translation.it: Meglio del whisky cinese che abbiamo bevuto in Brick Lane.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, that was… that was part of a job, so…
translation.it: Già. Ma era per lavoro, perciò…

translation.en: -[sighs] -Is that what I was to you?
Just part of the job.
I can taste when you're lying.
Training?
Meditation.
[Chatree] My meditation is meditation.
-[Kai] You're not worried about us losing? -[Chatree] No, I'm not.
Because if that should happen, Pan Gu would remake the world,
translation.it: Perché se succede, Pan Gu creerà un nuovo mondo,

translation.en: and we would simply be the forgotten dreams of a butterfly.
translation.it: e noi non saremo che i sogni dimenticati di una farfalla.

translation.en: Sounds peaceful.
But that is the one thing that the Wu Assassin can never have.
translation.it: La pace è una cosa che l'Assassino del Wu non avrà mai.

translation.en: He may have friends that he's shutting out.
translation.it: Ma può avere degli amici a cui non dice la verità.

translation.en: It's my responsibility to protect them.
[Chatree] You have lost one.
And now you're trying everything to avoid that pain again.
translation.it: E ora farai di tutto per evitare quel dolore.

translation.en: They're all I have left.
translation.it: Sono tutto ciò che mi resta.

translation.en: But Pan Gu seeks to control all.
translation.it: Ma Pan Gu vuole controllare ogni cosa.

translation.en: What do you want, Wu Assassin?
translation.it: Tu cosa vuoi, Assassino del Wu?

translation.en: We'll stop him.
We'll stop him. We'll make plans.
There's a Jeep there.
There is the path that leads to the main road.
translation.it: C'è un sentiero che porta alla strada principale.

translation.en: From there, it's an easy ride to wherever.
You did not come here to train
translation.it: Non sei venuto qui per allenarti

translation.en: or reflect.
You came here to leave
after everyone went to bed.
Last time I was here was, um…
translation.it: L'ultima volta che sono stata qui è stato…

translation.en: ten years ago.
Family had a farm by the river.
translation.it: La mia famiglia aveva una fattoria sul fiume.

translation.en: There was a bad flood.
Water came suddenly, and just like that…
translation.it: L'acqua arrivò all'improvviso, e in un attimo…

translation.en: my mum, my dad,
and my sister were gone.
translation.it: e mia sorella non c'erano più.

translation.en: No magical attack.
No clash for the world. It was, uh,
translation.it: Nessuno scontro per le sorti del mondo.

translation.en: just an accident.
There's nothing I can do to bring my family back,
translation.it: Non posso fare nulla per riportare indietro la mia famiglia,

translation.en: but I thought I could bring you some peace for Jen.
translation.it: ma voglio aiutarti a trovare pace per Jen.

translation.en: And that is why I'm helping.
At least there's something you can do.
You have Kai,
Me…
I'm all alone.
I'm sorry.
I didn't know. Well, you never asked.
translation.it: - Non lo sapevo. - Non me l'hai mai chiesto.

translation.en: This can't be real.
[Ku An Qi] It isn't.
[William] It's the version of the village in your mind
translation.it: È la versione del villaggio nella tua mente,

translation.en: from when you were a child.
But we can make it like this again. We can make it into whatever we want.
translation.it: - Ma possiamo farlo tornare così. - Possiamo renderlo come vuoi tu.

translation.en: [William] Pan Gu is all.
[in Thai] Mum, Dad, Ratana!
-[chuckles] -[Ratana] I miss you.
[William] You can be together again… -[sniffles] -…forever.
translation.it: Potete stare di nuovo insieme, per sempre.

translation.en: All we need is one small thing.
The Wu Assassin's Chi.
[whispering, echoing] It'll be easy.
-[in English] What are you doing? -I had no choice.
translation.it: - Che stai facendo? - Non ho avuto scelta.

translation.en: -What did they promise you? -[grunts]
Get up.
What's going on?
What do you think? [grunts]
I fuck with these.
-There's more down there. Let's go. -[Lu Xin] Yo! Tommy, hold up!
translation.it: - Ce ne sono altri di sotto, andiamo. - Tommy, aspetta!

translation.en: I'll get Preeya.
-What? -Be careful, okay?
I am getting really, really sick of this shit.
translation.it: Sono stufo marcio di questa merda.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Tommy, get the Jeep. We'll hold them off while Zama and Preeya get here.
translation.it: Tommy, prendi la jeep. Li tratteniamo finché non arrivano Zama e Preeya.

translation.en: Preeya betrayed us. -No. She wouldn't. -What?
translation.it: - Preeya ci ha traditi. - No, è impossibile.

translation.en: She took Ku An Qi's necklace.
-Fuck. -Lu, get Zama. Tommy, the car!
translation.it: - Cazzo. - Lu, cerca Zama. Tommy, l'auto!

translation.en: -Hold on. We're stronger together. -Just do as I say!
translation.it: - Aspetta, siamo più forti insieme. - Vai!

translation.en: Shit.
Oh shit.
[Lu Xin] Zama. Preeya betrayed us. We gotta go now.
translation.it: Zama. Preeya ci ha traditi. Dobbiamo andarcene.

translation.en: I know. I saw her leave with Pan's men. Let's go.
translation.it: Lo so, l'ho vista con gli uomini di Pan. Andiamo.

translation.en: Calm down, boys.
All right. Let's go, guys!
[Zulu] Come on, let's go.
Come on, everybody in.
You can no longer be stopped. It's in your hands now. Go!
translation.it: Non possono più fermarvi. È tutto nelle vostre mani. Andate!

translation.en: Don't let Pan Gu reform!
-No! Chatree! -[Lu Xin] Get in the car!
-[Zulu] We need to go! -[Lu Xin] Drive, Tommy!
[Kai] We shouldn't have left Chatree.
-Should have listened to me. -There wasn't anything to listen to.
translation.it: - Avreste dovuto ascoltarmi. - Non c'era niente da ascoltare.

translation.en: -I made a decision. -Yeah. Nothing new there, Kai.
translation.it: - Ho preso una decisione. - Sì, come sempre, Kai.

translation.en: -I'm leading us. -No, you're not. You're shutting us out.
translation.it: - Sta a me guidarci. - No, tu ci escludi.

translation.en: Guys, let's focus on what the fuck we're gonna do now.
translation.it: Concentriamoci su che cazzo fare adesso.

translation.en: I'm sorry. You have no right to say shit.
translation.it: Scusa? Tu non hai diritto di dire un cazzo.

translation.en: -What the fuck you talking about? -[Lu Xin] What do you mean?
translation.it: - Che cazzo dici? - Che cazzo dico?

translation.en: Your little girlfriend that you brought into our inner circle betrayed us.
translation.it: La tua ragazza ci ha traditi!

translation.en: [Tommy] You gonna put that on me?
Sure, you weren't on the lookout either. You were occupied fucking Zama.
translation.it: Ti sei distratto anche tu, preso com'eri a scoparti Zama.

translation.en: And, Kai, like, what the fuck? What were you doing? What was your plan?
translation.it: E Kai, tu che stavi facendo? Qual era il tuo piano?

translation.en: My plan was to kill Pan and Ku myself.
translation.it: Uccidere Pan e Ku da solo.

translation.en: -Like I should have done. -Yeah? Great, 'cause you're always right.
translation.it: - L'avrei dovuto fare da subito! - Certo, perché hai sempre ragione.

translation.en: We don't need you. I don't need any of you. True! I'm going myself.
translation.it: - Non ho bisogno di nessuno di voi. - Esatto! Vado da solo.

translation.en: -Get the fuck out of here! -[Zulu] Just stop it!
All of you. You're acting like little children.
translation.it: Tutti e tre. Sembrate dei bambini.

translation.en: Do I need to remind you
that we need to stop a god from destroying reality?
translation.it: che dobbiamo impedire a una divinità di distruggere la realtà?

translation.en: You say you're a family.
You're not acting like a family, not one that's about to save the world.
translation.it: Non vi comportate come una famiglia, non una che deve salvare il mondo.

translation.en: Because you cannot even take care of each other.
translation.it: Non sapete prendervi cura neanche gli uni degli altri.

translation.en: [Zulu] If you can…
just get over your anger…
your guilt…
Your ego.
We might actually have a chance. We really might.
translation.it: E potremmo farcela. Potremmo davvero farcela.

translation.en: So, let's remind ourselves.
Why are we here?
For Jenny.
She's right.
[sighs] We're all fucking idiots. [Kai] No, no, no, no.
translation.it: - Siamo degli idioti del cazzo. - No, no.

translation.en: I'm the idiot.
I'm a fucking idiot.
[sighs] For Jenny.
-For Jenny. -For Jenny.
Now we're getting somewhere.
When we were at Pan's temple,
translation.it: Quando eravamo al tempio di Pan, ho visto quel simbolo

translation.en: I saw that splitting symbol in a photo of a factory at another dig site.
translation.it: Quando eravamo al tempio di Pan, ho visto quel simbolo nella foto di un altro scavo.

translation.en: That's where the stone came from, so we gotta go to that dig site.
translation.it: La pietra viene da lì, ed è lì che dobbiamo andare.

translation.en: But they only have half of the symbol completed, so, like, they're gonna need your power.
translation.it: Ma hanno solo metà del simbolo completo, perciò gli serve il tuo potere.

translation.en: No. We shouldn't risk it.
No, no. We should. We should.
Because they'll come after all of us if we don't stop them.
translation.it: Verranno a cercarci, se non li fermiamo.

translation.en: This ends tonight.
If you all agree.
As long as we're smart about it.
You can count me in.
-We are all the Wu Assassins. -[chuckles]
Shit.
-Let's go kill a god. -[Tommy] Let's do it.
translation.it: - Andiamo ad ammazzare un dio. - Andiamo.

translation.en: There are a lot of guards here.
[Tommy] They'll know we're coming. They already know I'm here.
translation.it: - Sapranno che siamo qui. - Sanno già che io sono qui.

translation.en: [Zulu] In that case…
-[gun cocks] -Boom.
[Ku An Qi] This is where the first Wu Assassin tore us apart.
translation.it: È qui che il primo Assassino del Wu ci ha separati.

translation.en: [William] They'll be here soon.
[Ku An Qi] This Wu Assassin is particularly hard to kill.
translation.it: Questo Assassino del Wu è difficile da uccidere.

translation.en: I got this. [chuckles]
[Preeya] This thing killed my uncle.
translation.it: Questo affare ha ucciso mio zio.

translation.en: How many more people have to die before I get my family back?
translation.it: Quante altre persone devono morire prima che possa riavere la mia famiglia?

translation.en: Your problem, child, is that you see death as the end.
translation.it: Il tuo problema, bimba, è che vedi la morte come la fine.

translation.en: -You'll be with them soon enough. -[coughs]
[William] Along with all living things.
translation.it: Insieme a tutti gli esseri viventi.

translation.en: [Tommy] That's where the stone is melted. Those are the sleeping quarters.
translation.it: Lì è dove viene fusa la pietra. Quelli sono i dormitori.

translation.en: -Those are the main pressing machines. -[Lu Xin] How do you know?
translation.it: - E quelle le presse. - Come cazzo lo sai?

translation.en: [Tommy] Wikipedia.
We gotta be careful. They still need you for the ritual, so…
translation.it: Dobbiamo stare attenti. Tu gli servi per il rituale, quindi…

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Get down! Move!
-What do you want to do? -We're splitting up.
Yeah. We're not divided. We're dividing them.
translation.it: Sì, non ci stiamo separando. Separiamo loro.

translation.en: I got Zan. Lu, the Beast.
translation.it: Io penso a Zan. Lu, la Bestia.

translation.en: You guys find Pan and Ku.
-[gunshot] -[Lu Xin] Fuck!
Try this. It's got good range.
translation.it: Prova questo. Ha un buon raggio d'azione.

translation.en: -Be careful. -Okay.
[Kai] Zan!
[Lu Xin] Let's finish this.
I promised myself
translation.it: Mi ero ripromessa di eliminare ogni legame

translation.en: I'd erase anything related to when I was a pawn of your father's.
translation.it: Mi ero ripromessa di eliminare ogni legame con quando ero una pedina di tuo padre. Jenny è stata la prima.

translation.en: We started with Jenny.
translation.it: con quando ero una pedina di tuo padre. Jenny è stata la prima.

translation.en: And it ends when I kill you, Assassin.
You're not the one I'm looking for.
Well, we are who you've got, bitch.
The necklace isn't here. None of this matters if we can't find it.
translation.it: Il medaglione non è qui. È tutto inutile se non lo troviamo.

translation.en: They're not fools, Tommy. Let's go find the others.
translation.it: Non sono stupidi, Tommy. Cerchiamo gli altri.

translation.en: You fucking piece of shit.
-The fuck were you thinking? -Wait. No. Stop.
translation.it: - Che cazzo avevi in mente? - No, fermati!

translation.en: Tell me they mind-controlled you.
translation.it: Dimmi che controllavano la tua mente.

translation.en: They told me I could see my family again,
translation.it: Dicevano che avrei rivisto la mia famiglia

translation.en: and I made a mistake, and I'm so sorry. So sorry!
translation.it: e ho commesso un errore. Mi dispiace tanto.

translation.en: I messed up.
It's okay. It's okay.
Mastery over the body has its perks.
translation.it: Il controllo totale dei corpi ha i suoi vantaggi.

translation.en: [Preeya whispering] Fucking magic.
-[Kai] Give up. -[Zan] Never.
Get up!
[straining] This isn't for me.
This is for all of us.
[William] Welcome.
-Lu Xin! -[William] He'll be fine.
Your friends took out Ku. But you will not be so lucky.
translation.it: I tuoi amici hanno eliminato Ku, ma tu non sarai altrettanto fortunato.

translation.en: [in deep voice] I am Pan Gu, the first man.
translation.it: Io sono Pan Gu, il primo uomo.

translation.en: Control of mind, body, and soul.
translation.it: Controllo su mente, corpo e anima.

translation.en: Lu. Lu, wait. Hey.
Brother. It's not you!
-[Kai] Pan Gu! -[Lu Xin] Kai.
-What the fuck? -[groans]
The trouble is, you are but one man,
translation.it: Il problema è che tu non sei che un uomo,

translation.en: while I am all.
Brother, I don't want to do this.
[in demon voice] Thank you for your sacrifice.
No. No!
Lu! Lu! Lu!
Fight it.
We can't do this without you.
translation.it: Non possiamo farcela senza di te.

translation.en: Fight it, brother! Wake up!
[Kai] Come on, Lu! Get up!
We need you, brother!
[Preeya grunting] Tommy.
-[Zulu] Come on. You can do it. -Fucking bitch.
translation.it: - Forza, puoi farcela. - Stronza del cazzo.

translation.en: I think we've got bigger problems. Let's go.
translation.it: Mi sa che abbiamo problemi peggiori. - Lu! - Andiamo.

translation.en: Let's go.
What the fuck happened? Is that you? Hey.
translation.it: - Che cazzo è successo? - Sei tu?

translation.en: Of course, it's fucking me. Who else would it be?
translation.it: Certo che sono io, cazzo. Chi altro dovrebbe essere?

translation.en: [chuckling] Nice.
Let's kill this motherfucker.
Oh, fuck, yeah.
-[grunts] -Lu!
-Kai! -[Tommy] Lu, what's going on?
-[Kai] Ah, Lu! Ah! -It's sinking!
Grab that.
Kai! Heads up!
-I can't hold. -[Lu Xin] Hold on. Hold on, Kai!
translation.it: Non ce la faccio! Resisti! Resisti, Kai!

translation.en: [Kai] Lu!
[Lu Xin] Stay there. Zama!
-Yeah? -Follow me.
Tie that!
Gotcha.
-This is serious, man. -No shit!
translation.it: - È un guaio, amico. - Tu dici?

translation.en: -You guys know knots? -We're about to find out.
translation.it: - Sapete fare i nodi? - Stiamo per scoprirlo.

translation.en: Girl Scout those ropes together.
[Tommy] We'll bring 'em up with up this. Let me know when there's enough rope.
translation.it: Li tiriamo su con questa. Dimmi quando c'è abbastanza corda.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Kai, this isn't working. Come up with something. You're the Wu Assassin.
translation.it: Kai, non sta funzionando. Fa' qualcosa, sei L'Assassino del Wu.

translation.en: Come on! Grab it! Grab it!
-Zama? -Almost there.
Let me know when you guys are good.
Start pulling!
Ah! It's about time.
All right, guys. I need help. Come on! Come on!
[grunting] Come on, Zama.
[Tommy] Keep going! Keep going! Keep going!
[Kai] It's over.
I know a really nice, safe passage out. Come on.
translation.it: So come andarcene da qui. Venite.

translation.en: [Kai] Food's ready, guys.
Looks good. Hold it, man. First, a toast.
translation.it: - Sembra buono. - Aspetta, prima un brindisi.

translation.en: To family. New and old.
[all] To family. Cheers!
translation.it: - Alla famiglia. - Alla famiglia! - Salute. - Salute.

translation.en: To Jenny. [all] To Jenny.
[Preeya] So, Kai, what's next?
translation.it: Allora, Kai. Ora che si fa?

translation.en: -I'm off to fight a necromancer. -Ooh!
I guess we're going on vacation then.
-We? I thought you could handle yourself. -[Lu Xin] What do you mean?
translation.it: "Si va"? Pensavo… Puoi farcela da solo.

translation.en: Oh wow. Here we go with the talk. Look, look, look, just 'cause I kicked your ass,
translation.it: Non sa tenere la bocca chiusa. Senti, ti ho fatto il culo

translation.en: all of us saw it, but we don't have to talk about it.
translation.it: e l'hanno visto tutti, ma non serve parlarne.

translation.en: -[Kai] You wanna spar? You wanna try me? -Do I want to spar?
I don't got to prove anything to you!
You're the Wu Assassin. I'm just the Lu Assassin.
translation.it: Tu sei l'Assassino del Wu, io l'Assassino del Lu.

translation.en: -[Tommy] You gonna let him say that? -Oh!
Okay. Okay.
-[Zulu] Oh my God. That's crazy. -[Tommy] Guys, guys, guys.
translation.it: - Oddio! - Lo so fare anch'io! Voi siete pazzi!

translation.en: -[Tommy] Let's get him! -[Lu Xin] Ah!
-[Kai] Whoa, whoa, whoa! -[Tommy] He's going in. Get him in the water.
